so_51820942: for ip in $(cat $filename)
do
  servername=$(dig $nameserver -x $ip +short | sed 's/\.$//')
  echo "set address $servername ip-netmask $ip"
done

so_19027315: #!/bin/bash

while read line
do 
arr=(${line//|/ })
sed -i.bak "s#<element>.*</element>#<element>${arr[1]}${arr[3]}</element>#g" ${arr[4]}
done < 'source.txt'
